title: Cindy Crawford and daughter Kaia Gerber all business as they suit up for fashion event in New York
text:
They have both made their living strutting their stuff on the catwalk.

So it comes as no surprise that Cindy Crawford and Kaia Gerber can make any sidewalk their runway.

The 53-year-old supermodel and her 18-year-old daughter suited up as they headed to the Vogue: Forces Of Fashion event in New York City on Thursday.

Dynamic duo: Cindy Crawford (left) and daughter Kaia Gerber suited up as they headed to the Vogue: Forces Of Fashion event in New York City on Thursday

Putting the super in supermodel: The mother and daughter happily posed for snaps together at the event

Squad goals: They were joined by Vogue editor-in-chief Anna Winter at the gala as they all posed for a snap in their fashionable looks

The mother and daughter combination definitely turned heads as they arrived at the star-studded event at Spring Studios in the Big Apple.

Cindy donned a rather interesting blue pantsuit which featured a tie up blazer instead of the usual buttons at the torso.

She paired the flowy trousers with strappy black stiletto heels and accessorized with large brown designer shades.

On the go: They definitely turned heads as they arrived at the star-studded event at Spring Studios in the Big Apple

Out and about: Cindy, 53, donned a rather interesting blue pantsuit which featured a tie up blazer instead of the usual buttons at the torso

Lovely lady: She paired the flowy trousers with strappy black stiletto heels and accessorized with large brown designer shades

Simply stunning: The Fair Game actress wore her brunette tresses down as she accentuated her evergreen looks with complementary make-up.

The Fair Game actress wore her brunette tresses down as she accentuated her evergreen looks with complementary make-up.

Kaia donned an olive green suit featuring large gold buttons and a mini skirt with knee-high black leather booties.

She accessorized with black rounded shades and a matching small leather bag with gold detailings.

Making moves: Kaia donned an olive green suit featuring large gold buttons and a mini skirt with knee-high black leather booties

Up and coming: She accessorized with black rounded shades and a matching small leather bag with gold detailings

Bonding time: The mother and daughter duo looked happy to attend the event together

Keeping it cool: The family members were seen leaving the event together

Big fans: They each carried out the new issue of Vogue featuring Rihanna on the cover which still has yet to be released

Watch your step: Cindy kept talking to her daughter as they descended down the steps

Moving on: The mother and daughter are staples at high fashion events

Kaia has been busy making a name for herself on the runway as she rocked the catwalks at New York, Milan, and Paris fashion weeks last month.

Before the madness of strutting several shows at several different city's fashion weeks, Kaia rang in her 18th birthday.

She attended her New York City party in a strappy black leather dominatrix look by Versace.

Kaia was the spitting image of her supermodel mom, who donned a similar iconic look in the early '90s.

Happy birthday: Before the madness of strutting several shows at several different city's fashion weeks, Kaia rang in her 18th birthday
description: The 53-year-old supermodel and her 18-year-old daughter suited up as they headed to the Vogue: Forces Of Fashion event in New York City on Thursday.
